description.name: Nicolas Torres
description.text: , a Full-Stack Web Engineer specialized in TypeScript, Next.js, React, Node.js, and AI-enhanced systems. I have delivered scalable software to clients in Germany, Singapore, the USA, and Chileâ€”maintaining a 100% Job Success Score as a Top Rated talent on Upwork.
description.focus: My focus is to build clean, fast, and purposeful products that elevate how teams operate.

problem.title: Tired of Developers
problem.subtitle: You need a
problem.subtitleEnd: , not a robot. Someone who understands your business, thinks like an owner, and delivers code that truly moves the needle.
problem.sectionTitle: Most common problems I see in development teams:

technicalDebt.name: Technical Debt (Spaghetti Code)
technicalDebt.description: Fragile systems where fixing one bug creates three new ones. Scaling becomes costly and risky.

noVision.name: Executors without Vision
noVision.description: Developers who act like robots: they wait for exact orders and do not notice UX or business errors.

ghostDeadlines.name: Ghost Deadlines
ghostDeadlines.description: Estimates that are never met. Tickets drag on week after week without a real delivery date.

excuses.name: Excuses, not Results
excuses.description: The classic mindset of 'it works on my machine'. When there's a fire in production, no one takes control.

scalableArchitecture.name: Scalable Architecture
scalableArchitecture.description: I write clean, modular, and documented code. Your project will be easy to maintain today and scale tomorrow.

productPartner.name: Product Partner
productPartner.description: I don't just write code; I understand your business. I propose strategic improvements to maximize product value.

totalOwnership.name: Total Ownership
totalOwnership.description: I treat your project as if it were my own. If a problem arises, I take responsibility and lead the solution to the end.

radicalTransparency.name: Radical Transparency
radicalTransparency.description: No confusing technical jargon. I maintain constant communication so you always know the real status of development.

projects.section_subtitle: Explore my latest work and creative solutions.

reviews.title: What My Customers Say
reviews.subtitle: Genuine feedback from my valued customers, highlighting the quality and value of my projects.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Building software with soul and precision
about.description: I am NicolÃ¡s Richard Torres, a Chilean full stack engineer who believes that code should not only work: it must have purpose. I went from breaking systems out of curiosity to designing structures with ethics. Today, I transform ideas into platforms that combine art, engineering, and a dose of well-directed rebellion.

methodology.title: Philosophy and Methodology
methodology.description: My way of working is based on three pillars: clarity in architecture, autonomy to solve, and impact in every line of code. I rely on strict typing, living documentation, and transparent communication.

workStyle.title: Work Style
workStyle.description: Agile, autonomous, and detail-oriented. I propose solutions rather than waiting for instructions.

personal.title: Beyond the Code
personal.subtitle: Who am I? .... a person who likes to break things out of curiosity
personal.description: I am inspired by Hofmann and Leary, but also by the silence of the forest. Between commits and coffee, I study AI, explore responsible psychedelia, and create content for other developers. I believe that justiceâ€”even in softwareâ€”is a form of love.

specialties.description: Next.js, React, TypeScript, and systems where the interface matters as much as the logic.

stack.description: Node.js, Prisma ORM, tRPC, PostgreSQL, and scalable architectures with frictionless deployments.

description.focus: Building calm, fast products with a human voice.

review-01.title: Full-stack developer (React / NextJs / Tailwind) to build a dashboard page

review-02.title: Frontend Specialist for a Marketplace (Next.js) - Ongoing Project 95% Ready (Bugs+Small Tickets)
review-02.feedback: Nicolas was a great hire - very determined, motivated with an eye for detail. Even though he is young he brings everything you need to get the job done.

review-03.title: CMS fix static pages
review-03.feedback: Nicolas works very fast, he proposed a much better solution for the issue that needed to be resolved. A few extra tweaks were done without any questions. I am always satisfied.

review-04.title: DevOps Engineer with Expertise in Next.js, Nginx, and Automation
review-04.feedback: Nicolas did a 3 day job in just 12 hours. All requirements met and some extra jobs as well. Always a pleasure to work with Nicolas! Gracias

review-05.title: Fileserver milestone 2
review-05.feedback: Nicolas helped me to refine the fileserver upload functionalities and implemented it in an existing function. He was willing to help me with things outside scope.

review-06.title: Ubuntu DO fileserver with drag and drop
review-06.feedback: Nicolas has created a drag and drop fileserver functionality and helped me when I needed it. He is fast and knowledgeable, willing to go the extra mile.

review-07.title: Crypto screener using React js
review-07.feedback: Nicolas is an outstanding freelancer whose technical prowess is matched only by his commitment to excellence. With a tight deadline, he ensured full functionality.

review-08.title: Quick10x: Real-Time Crypto Analytics SaaS Platform â€” Need help with setting up Nodemailer JS
review-08.feedback: Very punctual, on task and project delivered within the expected timeframe. Thanks so much!

review-09.title: Full-Stack Developer Needed for Legal Compliance MVP
review-09.feedback: Nicolas has been excellent to work with. He understands complex concepts quickly and converts them into intuitive and functional solutions.

review-10.title: Front End Developer - Shadcn Admin Kit

review-11.title: Convert a 1 page figma into html

review-12.title: Quick Fix: Clerk Authentication & Neon Database Setup in Existing Wine Platform

review-13.title: Expert .NextJS developer needed for backend restructuring

review-15.title: Frontend Specialist for a Marketplace (Next.js) â€” Long Ongoing Project
review-15.feedback: We hired Nicolas for bug-fixing, but soon realised he's incredibly talented and grasps tasks ultra-fast. We extended him into a much longer project.

review-16.title: Full Stack Engineer - Applied AI Systems
review-16.feedback: Nicolas is a great engineer, brings great energy and enthusiasm. Highly recommended.

review-17.title: React & Node Dev Needed (Web App: Node, React, MUI & MySQL)

review-18.title: Recreate Website in React
review-18.feedback: It was an absolute pleasure working with Nicolas. Very responsive, great code, continuous support.
